description: Dashboard for Kubernetes Deployment with Prometheus.

targets.expr:
100
* sum by(pod, namespace) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{cluster=~"^$cluster$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",pod=~"^$deployment-[a-z0-9]+-[a-z0-9]+",container!~"POD|"}[2m]))
/ sum by(pod, namespace) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{cluster=~"^$cluster$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",pod=~"^$deployment-[a-z0-9]+-[a-z0-9]+",container!~"POD|"}[2m]))

title: Kubernetes Deployment - Prometheus
